items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: Project Summary: React Leaflet Map Integration This project showcases the integration of Leaflet, a versatile open-source mapping library, into both plain HTML/CSS/JavaScript applications and React applications. It provides a lightweight and customizable alternative to Google Maps, allowing developers to easily implement interactive maps.
items.title: kuntalkumar/map-clustering: Project Summary: React Leaflet Map Integration This project showcases the integration of Leaflet, a versatile open-source mapping library, into both plain HTML/CSS/JavaScript applications and React applications. It provides a lightweight and customizable alternative to Google Maps, allowing developers to easily implement interactive maps.
